data.title: Great artists, bad people?
data.meta_description: I am interested in thinking about the conundrum of how to understand great artists who were bad people. Who do you think should fit in this category, and has the art world resolved mixed feelings...
data.text:
About Ask MetaFilter

Ask MetaFilter is a question and answer site that covers nearly any question on earth, where members help each other solve problems. Ask MetaFilter is where thousands of life's little questions are answered.
